Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back 2 X 60 MINUTE MASSAGE PER PERSON View gallery / Back Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa - Aerial View Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa - Resort View Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa - Lobby Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa Vietnam Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa &vert; 7 Nights • Transfers • Meals & drinks Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa Victoria Hoi An Beach Resort & Spa is located along Cua Dai Beach, just 15 minutes from Hoi An Ancient Town by shuttle bus or private car and 30 minutes from Da Nang International Airport. The resort is modelled after a traditional fishing village with small laneways, picturesque ponds and village houses with clay tiled roofs. View more View less 7 nights + transfers, meals & more from $ 2059 per person share twin. Flights are additional 2 X 60 MINUTE MASSAGE PER PERSON Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 28 Nov 25 or until sold out Deal Includes: Return airport to hotel transfers 7 nights accommodation Complimentary upgrade to the next room category (Subject to availability) Welcome fruit in the room Daily breakfast Daily 2 course lunch Daily 3 course dinner All drinks between 12:00pm to 9:00pm including an assortment of beverages, such as local beer, select cocktails, house red and white wine, house spirits, soft drinks, juice, mocktails, tea & coffee. 2 x One hour massage per guest per stay. 20% discount for additional massages. 10% discount on the resort excursion menu. FREE use of bicycles (subject to availability) FREE use of Kayaks (subject to weather conditions) FREE Daily shuttle bus to Hoi An Old Town (at resorts scheduled time) FREE daily movies at the hotels in-house theatre (at resorts scheduled times) Guaranteed late check-out until 6pm Room Types Superior River View Room With a picturesque view overlooking the romantic Vong River, the Superior room offers an ideal comfort for all guests. The spacious and airy balcony is meticulously designed, along with the warm color scheme of the wooden floor inside, creating an ideal space for you to relax. 7 night accommodation package from $2059 per person share twin. Flights are additional Extra nights from $294 per person Travel 01 May - 30 Jun 26, 01 Sep - 30 Sep 26 7 night accommodation package from $2279 per person share twin. Flights are additional Extra nights from $326 per person Travel 01 Mar - 09 Mar 26, 12 Mar - 20 Mar 26, 24 Mar - 30 Apr 26, 01 Jul - 31 Aug 26 Junior Suite Indulge in the breathtaking sunrise over the sea from the vantage point of the luxurious Junior Suite, promising guests a unique experience with upscale design, diverse styles, and convenient amenities including an outdoor bathroom and a jacuzzi hot tub. 7 night accommodation package from $3119 per person share twin. Flights are additional Extra nights from $446 per person Travel 01 May - 30 Jun 26, 01 Sep - 30 Sep 26 7 night accommodation package from $3345 per person share twin. Flights are additional Extra nights from $478 per person Travel 01 Mar - 19 Mar 26, 23 Mar - 30 Apr 26, 01 Jul - 31 Aug 26 If the advertised room types don't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 4pm on 28 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 31 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Flights are additional. • Any additional nights accommodation required due to flight schedules are at the customers expense • Min/max stays apply • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary on twin share options • Twin share is two adults sharing a room using existing bedding • Resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and is a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Advertised prices are per person for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit card fees will apply. • Full payment is required at time of booking • Accommodation is limited and subject to availability at time of booking • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
